text: Afrikanych () is a 1970 Soviet comedy movie directed by Mikhail Yershov.Фильмы по книгам Василия Белова покажут на телеканале «Культура»АФРИКАНЫЧ It stars Oleg Belov, Irina Bunina, and Larisa Burkova. == Actors == * Oleg Belov * Irina Bunina as Katerina * Larisa Burkova * German Orlov as Mitka * Nikolay Trofimov as Ivan Afrikanych == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:1970 comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Yershov
title: Afrikanych
